duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and compile lists of prospective customers for use as sales leads.
Call on current and potential customers to identify profitable business opportunities.
Work with customer representatives and operational personnel to develop and demonstrate solutions for customer problems.
Prepare and present quotations for requested repairs or repairs identified through inspections.
Complete all necessary reporting via reports and/or CRM system to create records of all customer contacts, sales calls, and opportunities.
Promote a positive image of the company and its employees.
